谼字的基本解释

谼
hóng
深沟；大谷：“余流滑无声，快泻双石谼。”
桥拱：“桥谼各二丈。”
古通“洪”，大水：“是时山泐桐柏，发谼喷涌，下注淮渎。”

谼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户公切，平東，匣。］
(1)大壑。
(2)桥下通水道。
(3)山洪。

谼字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【谷字部】　谼； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1190第06
【廣韻】戸公切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡公切，?音洪。【玉篇】大谷名。【類篇】大壑也。【莊子·達生篇】孔子觀呂梁，懸水三十仞，流沫四十里，今謂呂梁谼。　又亭名。【蘇軾詩】河漲西來失舊谼，孤城渾在水光中。自題云：僕在彭城，大水後登望谼亭，偶留此詩。　又寺名。【廣韻】谼谷寺，在相州。　又嶺名。【北齊書·斛律金傳】高祖自出北道，度赤谼嶺。　又希谼。人名，見【宋史·宗室表】。

谼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
谼字的起名意思

暂无。

Idiot
Basic explanation of words
Idiot
hóng
Deep ditch; Otani: "The remaining stream is slippery and silent, and the double stone is quickly decayed."
Bridge arch: "The bridge is two feet apart."
Gu Tong "Hong", Dashui: "It is Shishan Litongbai, gushing, betting on Huaidu."
Idiot
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" Hu Gongqie, Pingdong, Xie. ]
(1) Dahe.
(2) Waterway under the bridge.
(3) Flash floods.
Idiot
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Gu Zi Department] 　谼; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1190 Page 06
[Guang Yun] Gong Gong cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Hu Gong cut,? Yin Hong. [Jade articles] Otani name. [Classes] Dahe also. [Zhuangzi·Dasheng Chapter] Confucius's view of Lvliang was 30 li in the water and 40 li in the foam. Today it is called Lv Liang 谼.　 Also named as a pavilion. [Su Shi's poem] The river rises to the west and the old is lost, and the lonely city is muddled in the water. The self-proposition goes: Serve in Pengcheng, and after the flood, I will go to look at the pavilion, and I will leave this poem occasionally.　Also the name of the temple. [Guangyun] Digu Temple, in Xiangzhou.　Also the name of the mountain. [Book of Northern Qi·Hulujin Biography] The great ancestor went to Chizhe Ridge since he left North Dao.　It's hopeful again. Names, see 【Song History·Clan List】.
